skills.skill: Partnering with PR agency and stakeholders

duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute marketing programs and campaigns that will enhance customer loyalty on all digital channels.
Partner with stakeholders and PR agency on all initiatives and social media activities.
Support strategic decisions with ROI based analysis and track key performance indicator to measure campaign.
Analyze data and derive insights to make actionable business decisions.
Ensure brand voice consistency and adherence to brand guidelines in all communication.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field. Master's degree preferred.
